name: Mini Gardens
description:
Inspired by French castles and gardens, take a stroll through your very own mini castle gardens.

No points, no achievements, just the simple joy of building beautiful gardens and serene nature.  If you like Townscaper, Dorfromantik and other chill building games give it a try and leave a comment if you would like to see more tiles, bigger maps, etc.

Update:

New puzzle sandbox mode

  • Place random tiles only but as many tiles as you want
  • Bigger tileset
  • Get 1 undo every 5 tiles placed
